column3: Is t-SNE affected by the seed?
(perplexity constraint) Is nrow(X) the number of genes or cells?
Is UMAP affected more than t-SNE by the seed? Or less?
column4: UMAP is more sensitive, plot has changed drastically
column5: t-SNE is more sensitive. UMAP emphasis on global structure helps.
column7: Being stochastic means that any behaviour can be expected, depends on the seed…

column3: Would decreasing the number of PCs fed to the UMAP algorithm change our visualization? Would you say the results are 'better'?
column4: No, it didn’t change at all
column5: Yes, and it’s better with few PCs
column6: Yes, and it’s worst if we have too few PCs!
